casebody.data:
Second Department,

February, 1962*

(February 28, 1962) Anthony Chupka et al., Appellants, v. Lorenz-Schneider Co., Inc., et al., Respondents.

Not published with other decision of February 28, 1962, 16 A D 2d 829.— [Rep.

Motion by appellants for a stay, pending appeal, denied. Beldock, P. J., Ughetta, Christ, Hill and Hopkins, JJ., concur.
